Description:
Agentic AI refers to systems that go beyond simple question-answering or rule-based automation. These systems are **autonomous**, **goal-oriented**, and **adaptive** — meaning they can plan, act, and learn with minimal human oversight.

[https://dellenny.com/how-agentic-ai-works-and-how-to-build-it-in-azure/](https://dellenny.com/how-agentic-ai-works-and-how-to-build-it-in-azure/)
EnhancedContent:
Agentic AI refers to systems that go beyond simple question-answering or rule-based automation. These systems are **autonomous**, **goal-oriented**, and **adaptive** — meaning they can plan, act, and learn with minimal human oversight.

[https://dellenny.com/how-agentic-ai-works-and-how-to-build-it-in-azure/](https://dellenny.com/how-agentic-ai-works-and-how-to-build-it-in-azure/)
Title: How Agentic AI Works and How to Build It in Azure
Author: JohnNaguib
